requestItem.title: Request Custom Item
requestItem.subtitle: Found something you love from an external store? We'll source it for you
requestItem.urlHelp: Link to the product page helps us find it faster
requestItem.detailsPlaceholder: Tell us more about the item - color, size, specifications, or any special requirements...
requestItem.detailsHelp: The more details you provide, the better we can source the right item

requestItem.step2: Our team will source the item and confirm pricing
requestItem.step3: You'll receive a quote and can approve the purchase

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a passion for excellence and community, Alaa Gym Group brings together the world's finest products in one curated collection. We believe that quality should never be compromised, and style should always be timeless.
story.paragraph2: Our team travels the globe to discover unique pieces that embody craftsmanship, innovation, and elegance. Each item in our collection tells a story and represents our commitment to bringing you only the best.
story.paragraph3: Join us on this journey of discovery and elevate your lifestyle with products that are designed to last and inspire.
